title: if you exit out of game before nexus blows up, you cant honor a teammate
body:
before patch 8.3 you could honor a teammate if you left the game while the enemy was taking down ur nexus. 

after patch 8.3 you cant. the honor system is bad enough as it is please fix this so i can at least honor my 0-10 adc for tiltproof (kappa).

replies.body: Looking at the nexus explode is an important part of the gameplay and they want you to experience it every game for the 3000th time.
Why would you leave a game before it's over? There are more than a few times my nexus has been on very little health and we've saved it, wiped them and won...
